name: TURNS_PLAYED1
description: Play for 10 turns, across any number of playthroughs.

name: DIFFICULTY0_VICTORY
description: Win a game in Newbie or higher difficulty against AI.

name: DIFFICULTY1_VICTORY
description: Win a game in Easy or higher difficulty against AI.

name: DIFFICULTY2_VICTORY
description: Win a game in Normal or higher difficulty against AI.

name: DIFFICULTY3_VICTORY
displayName: Strove, Sought, Found, Did Not Yield
description: Win a game in Hard or higher difficulty against AI.

name: DIFFICULTY4_VICTORY
description: Win a game in Serious or higher difficulty against AI.

name: DIFFICULTY5_VICTORY
description: Win a game in Impossible or higher difficulty against AI.

name: DIFFICULTY6_VICTORY
displayName: The Learner Is Now the Master
description: Win a game in "Endless" difficulty against AI.

name: MULTIPLAYER_GAME
description: Play a game in multiplayer with at least one another human.

name: MULTIPLAYER_VICTORY
description: Win a game in multiplayer with at least one another human.

name: EXPANSION_VICTORY
description: Win an Expansion Victory.

name: ECONOMY_VICTORY
description: Win an Economic Victory.

name: DIPLOMACY_VICTORY
description: Win a Diplomatic Victory.

name: MOSTTECHNOLOGIESDISCOVERED_VICTORY
description: Win a Science Victory.

name: GLOBALSCOREWHENLASTTURNREACHED_VICTORY
description: Win a Score Victory.

name: SUPREMACY_VICTORY
description: Win a Supremacy Victory.

name: LASTEMPIRESTANDING_VICTORY
description: Win an Elimination Victory.

name: WONDER_VICTORY
description: Win a Wonder Victory.

name: TUTORIAL_VICTORY
description: Finish the basics of tutorial.

name: FACTIONBROKENLORDS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Broken Lords.

name: FACTIONRAGEWIZARDS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Ardent Mages.

name: FACTIONMADFAIRIES_VICTORY
description: Win with the Wild Walkers.

name: FACTIONNECROPHAGES_VICTORY
description: Win with the Necrophages.

name: FACTIONROVINGCLANS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Roving Clans.

name: FACTIONVAULTERS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Vaulters.

name: FACTIONDRAKKENS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Drakken.

name: FACTIONCULTISTS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Cultists of the Eternal End.

name: FACTION_CUSTOM_VICTORY
description: Win with a Custom Faction.

name: BEST_EMPIRE_PLAN
description: Activate all the 4th levels in the Empire Plan.

name: MAX_NET_CITY_DUST_ACH
description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Dust.

name: MAX_NET_CITY_FOOD_ACH
description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Food.

name: MAX_NET_CITY_SCIENCE_ACH
description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Science.

name: MAX_NET_CITY_INDUSTRY_ACH
description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Industry.

name: MAX_NET_CITY_INFLUENCE_ACH
description: Have one city which produces more than 500 Influence.

name: MINOR_FACTIONS_ASSIMILATION
description: Assimilate 3 minor factions.

name: FINAL_QUESTER
description: Finish the last chapter of a faction quest.

name: ALL_STRATEGIC_EXTRACTORS
description: Exploit each kind of strategic resource in one game.

name: ALL_STRATEGIC_RESOURCES
description: Have 100 of each strategic resource.

name: ALL_LUXURY_BOOSTER_USED
description: Use a booster of each luxury resource, across any number of playthroughs.

name: MANY_ACTIVE_LUXURY_BOOSTERS
description: Have 5 active luxury boosters at the same time.

name: ALL_FIS_BOOSTER_USED
description: Use a Food, a Science, and an Industry stockpile in one game.

name: TWO_CITIES_EARLY
description: Have two cities in less than 15 turns.

name: MANY_LEVELED_BOROUGHS
description: Have 3 city tiles at level 2 in one of your cities.

name: BUILDER
description: Build 100 improvements in your entire Empire in one game.

name: BEST_SCORE_EARLY_DIFFICULTY3
description: Be the faction with the highest score at turn 25 playing on hard or higher difficulty.

name: BEST_SCORE_EARLY_DIFFICULTY6
description: Be the faction with the highest score at turn 25 playing on Endless difficulty.

name: FAST_EXPLORER
description: Explore 1 000 tiles before the 50th turn.

name: VILLAGE_PACIFIER
description: Pacify 500 villages, across any number of playthroughs.

name: MASS_DUST_GAINED
description: Gain 1 000 000 of Dust, across any number of playthroughs.

name: MANY_TRADE_ROUTES
description: Get 20 trade routes or more starting from, crossing or reaching your empire.

name: HERO_HOARDER
description: Have 8 heroes in one game.

name: HERO_LEVELER
description: Level up a hero to level 15.

name: UNITS_KILLER
description: Kill 1 000 units, across any number of playthroughs.

name: KILLED_MIGRATION_UNIT
description: Kill a roving city.

name: ATTACK_ALLY_WITH_PRIVATEERS
description: Attack a friendly army with privateers.

name: ARDENT_MAGES_MANY_PILLARS
description: With the Ardent Mages, have 5 pillars at the same time.

name: BROKEN_LORDS_DISTRICT_DUST
description: With the Broken Lords, have a district producing more than 10 Dust.

name: CULTISTS_MANY_CONVERTED_VILLAGES
description: With the Cultists, have 20 converted villages at the same time.

name: DRAKKENS_VICTORY_NO_WAR
description: With the Drakken, win a game without having been in war.

name: NECROPHAGES_MANY_CADAVER_BOOSTER_USED
description: With the Necrophages, use 10 recycled stockpiles in one game.

name: ROVING_CLANS_IRS
description: With the Roving Clans, get more than 1 000 Dust from the Market Place taxes.

name: VAULTERS_TELEPORTER
description: With the Vaulters, teleport 10 units in a besieged city in one turn.

name: WILD_WALKERS_WIN_WITHOUT_DAMAGE
description: With the Wild Walkers, win a battle against at least 4 enemies without taking any damage.

name: QUEST_COMPLETED_ENDLESSDAY
description: ...in the ruins all across Auriga, and even throughout...

name: MULTIPLE_CITY_CONQUERED_WINTER
description: Conquer 5 cities during a single winter.

name: LONG_UNBROKEN_ALLIANCE
description: Finish a game while never breaking an alliance you made at least 100 turns ago.

name: DRAKKEN_MANY_RUINS_EXPLOITED
description: As the Drakken, exploit at least 5 ruins at the same time.

name: QUEST_VICTORY
description: Win a Quest Victory.

name: SCENARIO_VICTORY
description: Win a game with generation presets other than default.

name: ALL_COLOSSI
description: Have the 5 different Guardians at the same time.

name: ALL_WONDERS
description: Have the 5 Legendary Buildings at the same time.

name: ALL_MEDALS
description: Complete all the Legendary Deeds, across any number of playthroughs.

name: CAPTURE_WONDER
description: Capture a city containing a Legendary Building.

name: COLOSSI_KILLER
description: Kill a Guardian.

name: COOP_QUEST_CONTRIBUTOR
description: Contribute to a completed Co-operative Quest.

name: HERO_CAPTURE
description: Capture 10 spies, across any number of playthroughs.

name: SPY_ACTION_SERIES
description: Perform 5 infiltration actions without leaving the infiltrated city.

name: KILL_GOVERNOR
displayName: I Came I Slew I Scampered
description: With a spy, return a governor to his owner's academy without being detected.

name: PILLAGE_BUILDINGS
description: Pillage 30 buildings, across any number of playthroughs.

name: PILLAGE_DUST_LOOT
description: Get 500 Dust by pillage.

name: FACTIONREPLICANTS_VICTORY
description: Win a game with the Forgotten.

name: FIRST_SECOND_ERA_REPLICANTS
description: With the Forgotten, be the first to reach the 2nd Era.

name: STEAL_TECHNOLOGIES
description: With the Forgotten, steal 10 researches.

name: COLLECT_ORBS_PLAYTHROUGH
description: Collect 1 000 Pearls in one game.

name: COLLECT_ORBS_OVERALL
description: Collect 10 000 Pearls, across any number of playthroughs.

name: COLLECT_BIG_ORB
description: Collect 1 Pearl Cluster with a value of at least 20.

name: FIGHT_ON_ICE
description: Start and win a battle on frozen waters.

name: DROWN_ON_ICE
description: Lose one army due to the thaw.

name: CAST_VOTES_OVERALL
description: Spend 1 000 prayers on Winter votes, across any number of playthroughs.

name: ALL_ORB_UNLOCKS
description: Unlock all Blessings of the Altar of Auriga in one game.

name: FACTIONWINTERSHIFTERS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Allayi.

name: FORCE_SHIFT_OVERALL
description: Have 100 force-shifted units, across any number of playthroughs.

name: BATTLE_SHIFT_FORM_VARIETY
description: Fight with an army, reinforcements included, having both Light and Dark forms of each of the Allayi units (Seeker, Skyfin and Monk).

name: MANTA_EXTRACTION_OVERALL
description: Extract 100 strategic or luxury resources in another empire, across any number of playthroughs.

name: ALL_FORTRESSES
description: Control every Fortress in the world.

name: ALL_UNIQUE_FACILITIES
description: Control each of the unique facilities across any number of playthroughs.

name: OCEAN_CONTROL_WITH_TRADE
description: Complete your control of an ocean by trading for a Fortress.

name: FOG_BANK_AMBUSH
description: Ambush an enemy army from a fog-bank.

name: ATTACK_LAND_WITH_SUBMERSIBLE
description: Attack an army containing only land units with an army containing only submersible units.

name: FOMORIAN_QUEST_COMPLETER
description: Complete 5 quests for the Fomorians in a single game.

name: FOMORIAN_FORTRESS_CAPTURE
description: Capture 50 Fomorian-controlled Fortresses across any number of playthroughs.

name: BATTLE_FOMORIANS_VARIETY
description: Win a battle using an army containing each type of Fomorian warship.

name: SEA_DEMONS_NO_LAND_UNITS
description: As Morgawr, win the game without ever building or purchasing land units (except for Settler units).

name: SEA_DEMONS_OCEANIC_HUB
description: As Morgawr, control an ocean which borders 4 or more land regions you control.

name: SEA_DEMONS_4_CONTINENTS
description: As Morgawr, control one region on at least 4 different continents.

name: BLACK_SPOT_USED
description: As Morgawr, use a Black Spot to prompt the elimination of an empire by a third party.

name: FACTIONSEADEMONS_VICTORY
description: Win a game with the Morgawr.

name: SHARED_VICTORY
description: Win a Shared Victory.

name: FACTIONFLAMES_VICTORY
description: Achieve victory with the Kapaku.

name: TILES_TERRAFORMED_OVERALL
displayName: A World Of Fire And Ash
description: Volcanoform 400 tiles over any number of playthroughs.

name: ALL_GEOMANCY_BUFFS
description: Possess a unit with all Geomancy buffs active simultaneously.

name: ENEMY_EXPLOITATION_TERRAFORMED
description: Volcanoform an enemy city's entire exploited tiles.

name: DUST_STORM_AMBUSH
description: Ambush an enemy army from a Dust Blizzard.

name: ALL_MAP_BOOSTS_BUFFS
displayName: A Total Eclipse Of The Art
description: Possess an army with all Dust Eclipse map-based buffs active simultaneously.

name: MAD_SEASON_TEMPLES_INVESTIGATION
description: Search 12 Temples in a single Dust Eclipse.

name: MAD_FAIRIES_HIGH_SPEED_JOURNEY
description: Move an army 20 tiles in a single turn with the Wild Walkers.

name: BROKEN_LORDS_DUST_CONSUMER_OVERALL
description: Sacrifice 8000 total HP using Soul Burn over any number of playthroughs.

name: VAULTERS_TELEPORT_TO_SIEGING_HERO
description: Teleport 5 or more units to a sieging Vaulter hero.

name: NECROPHAGES_BATTLEBORN_CREATOR
description: Spawn 30 Battle Born using Cadaver stockpiles in a single game.

name: RAGE_WIZARDS_CRITICAL_DAMAGE
description: Inflict 800 damage with a single unit in a single attack as the Ardent Mages.

name: ROVING_CLANS_HERO_KILLER_SETSEKE
description: Kill an enemy hero with a Setseke.

name: DRAKKENS_INSTANT_WORLD_PEACE
description: Restore the peace with a least 3 empires within a single turn.

name: CULTISTS_MINIONS_LEGION
description: Win 8 battles with armies exclusively composed of minor faction units within a single turn.

name: FACTIONMIMICS_VICTORY
description: Win with the Mykara.

name: SPORETASTIC
description: Create 1000 Fungal Blooms across any number of playthroughs.

name: CREEPING_SPREE
description: Create 50 Fungal Blooms in a single game.

name: RESISTANCE_IS_FUTILE
description: Integrate 7 factions in a single game.

name: WELCOME_TO_THE_FOLD
description: Control 20 Overgrown Cities at the same time.

name: MONSTER_WRANGLER
description: Control all 3 Urkans at the same time.

name: SHADOW_OF_THE_COLOSSI
description: Have all 3 Urkans affect a single one of your cities at the same time.

name: THE_EXTERMINATOR
description: Kill 1000 Lice units across any number of playthroughs.

name: SHAKE_YOUR_FUNDATIONS
description: Deal 1 000 000 damage with Tremors over any number of playthroughs.

name: CATCH_AND_RELEASE
description: Take control of an Urkan owned by another faction and set it free (in the same turn).
